Blog.post: hi .... i cut my hair till veri short till can't tie le ... gd rite den i can concentrate more on my study ... wa c ur nick when i come baCk sure not refer to mi de bax ... if den too sad loh ... haha ltr going mac to study leh ... so sian .. one more month den exam come le ... :p haha in my heart that only u and to study hard ... not gd mehz i trying hard to study and not changing myself to go and suit you ... haha ltr hoilday den go rebond my hair again... haha .... i duno wat u doing and i dun wan to go guess ... thanx liang told mi hu u like i aso got tell u ... promise wor it going to be a secret 4 both of us ... :p .. haha i alway been hoping that cw and ya can be together hope one day it going to come true ... haha ... by the way last week a math paper i pass up blank paper coz i duno how to do .... wednesday going c concert ... haha so sian ltr i fall asleep ... by the way i shd have already learn that u are not beside mi anymore ..... :( ... take care ... miz ya

hi ... yap yap .... happy birthdae , do u won her heart , i hope u have ... den u will be veri happy ... kanna so mani ppl beat , heart got a little pain ... are u fine ... sms u at nitez den i will noe .... heehee tuesday go woodland sec , mei dun lose face 4 mi kkzz .... haha all the best for you... that they i nv put sushi on our table coz i scare u throw den i will cry ... but i heard mei yi sae u ask abt mi ... thanx im fine ... dun worry i thinking how to change myself ... are ur msn nick refer to mi ... hope so ... den i can cheer up a bit more .... but think longer i think not mi ... nvm ... maybe ur frienz ship end here due to fridae .... anyway we have happy dae already ... and that enuff 4 mi ... really .... cw and rl dun turn bad ah ... if not i wun let jh leave in peace de althought he ur brother ... rl hu u like nv tell mi den i keep guessing u aso sae wrong ... dun guess le so wuliao , maybe u bluff mi de aso .... :p haha .... tml is one week u nv tok to mi le ... i getting use to it already dun worry ... i think ur nick aso not mi lol .... y botter to change 4 u ....

Sobz Sobz ... Tell mi go Sch ... Go le loh ... seeing mi crying you happy le ma ... i noe you are not happy aso... sorry ... dun tok to mi den dun tok loh ... since it so hard for you... i will try to turn back to myself ok ... i promise you ... can , mi really veri sad le lei ... i would not be by ur sides anymore , not help or cares for you again ... take care of urselves can ... i duno wat u thinking but i noe you not feeling beta den mi ... mi will study hard from todae onward , nth is important ... without u joking and laughter mi is half dead aso ... alway noe u seem so important to mi , every words you spoken i mind alot de loh ... u should noe that beta den anyone ... this is the 1st time seeing you care for mi .... but it hurt mi alot ... wan mi to be like last time rite ... sure i will try my best to do it ... nv going to cry infront of you ... i'ill be fine , dun worry 4 mi ... see you joking wif yiai again remind mi of all the thing again ... let it be like this i dun wan change anything since you like it so much ... dun wan tok and sae anymore le ... sobz sobz .... hope after this week i will be fine again ...

yoz ... why don't i tell you wat i had done todae .... it juz cheer mi up alot .... haha .... so happy ... having hongyi accompany for two daes le ... thanx alot ... haha early morning came ee jun kor .... help to an wei him, coz he aso heart broken ... den the siao guy jio mi stead and kanna mi lecture until mi so happy ... haha , kor thanx u cheer mi up too without u knowing too ... chat wif yiai , serene and wai keong .... at nite came alan, wei hong , serene (again) haha , and rui liang ... he yold mi alot lol ... and i realise my mistake also ... and i apologise to chia wei le .... heehee ... really sry ... thanx liang ah ... i nv noe if he nv tell ... by the way i noe him more after chatting ytd ... a good guy to go and noe ... and i noe him .... haha thanx u taught mi sumthing aso ... but not love de is all abt life ... ur reasoning is so many juz like mi ... haha juz different topic .... ok ... thanx frenz ... all help mi alot this few daes
